Hi all, 

I don't think this planetary astrological information thing can b=
ring any more benefit than trying just random choices. To be honest, this i=
s so silly I wouldn't try it myself. It's a better idea to observe the Sun'=
s activity than other planets. There are hundreds of thousands of objects i=
n the solar system, why only planets should have impact on us, as everythin=
g is made from the same stuff? How about exoplanets throughout the galaxy? =
Astrology is just another twisted kind of stupidity. The market is a chaoti=
c system and the best chances are that it can be predicted for a short time=
. Even this is a hard task, considering the high liquidity of the market. I=
 don't think that Uranus's weather has anything to do with the direction of=
 EUR/USD today, people. This is absolutely silly and metaphysical. lol

Pet=
er
